pageContext.claim: “Joe Biden is a reclamation project. Some things are just not salvageable. China and other countries that ripped us off for years are begging for him. He deserted our military, our law enforcement and our healthcare. Added more debt than all other Presidents combined. Won't win!”
pageContext.analysis: To start with, Joe Biden was never president. Plus, looking at how the debt grew over a president’s term isn’t especially useful. Every president inherits a debt from the previous one, making it virtually certain that the pile of debt is going to grow. So raw numbers don't tell you much; what’s important is the percentage change in the time period being measured. That said, Obama’s debt to GDP ratio was high, though it was not the highest ever.
